item.title: The Trump Media & Technology Group will integrate the Crypto.com Wallet and introduce the CRO token
item.description: On August 26th, as per market information, the Trump Media & Technology Group is set to integrate the Crypto.com digital wallet. Additionally, it will incorporate the CRO token into both the Truth Social and Truth+ platforms.

item.title: CRO Short-Term Breaks Through $0.2, Surging Over 19% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 26th, based on market data, CRO briefly exceeded $0.2 and is now trading at $0.192, with a 24-hour increase of 19.08%.

item.title: The Trump Media Group plans to spend $6.42 billion to acquire CRO Digital
item.description: On August 26th, as reported by Bloomberg, the Trump Media Group intends to acquire CRO Digital at a price of $6.42 billion.

item.title: Binance Wallet's Inaugural Mitosis Booster Attracts Over 90,000 Participants, Surpasses $300 Million in 7-Day Lock-up
item.description: August 26th, based on official information, Binance Wallet announced that the first stage of the Mitosis exclusive Booster event was successfully completed within 7 days. The total locked value exceeded $300 million, attracting more than 90,000 users to actively participate.Starting from today, the second stage of the Mitosis Booster event has officially begun. Users can deposit USDT or BNB into the Simple Yield Mitosis pool and have the chance to share a total of 1.4 million MITO rewards.

item.title: White House National Economic Council Director: Fed's September Meeting Likely to See 25 Basis Point Rate Cut
item.description: On August 26th, the White House Economic Adviser Bernstein stated that there is a high likelihood that the Fed will reduce interest rates by 25 basis points at the September meeting, and the risk of the Fed Chairman being overruled is "emerging" (IG).

item.title: White House Economic Council Director: Trump Dismissing Powell Could Lead to Inflation and Long-Term Rate Hikes
item.description: On August 26th, Brian Deese, the Director of the White House National Economic Council, when referring to Trump's removal of Federal Reserve Board member Lael Brainard, stated that this was an unprecedented assault on the Federal Reserve. Such an action could potentially result in inflation and an increase in long-term interest rates. (FX168)

item.title: Blockchain Payment Infrastructure Kira Completes $6.7M Seed Round, Backed by Blockchange Ventures
item.description: On August 26th, as per prnewswire, the blockchain payment infrastructure Kira declared the completion of a seed round funding amounting to $6.7 million. Participants in this round included Blockchange Ventures, Vamos Ventures, Stellar Blockchain, Grit Ventures, Credibly Neutral Ventures, Michael Seibel, and Oso Trava.It is introduced that Kira makes use of the Stellar blockchain to achieve fast and low-cost payment services. Currently, it is concentrating on the Latin American market and is providing support to large enterprises or startups in launching embedded financial products.

item.title: Blockchain Networking Module Developer Hemi Labs Completes $15 Million Financing Round, Lead by YZi Labs
item.description: On August 26th, as per The Block, the modular blockchain network Hemi Network's developer, Hemi Labs, has successfully completed a funding round amounting to $15 million. This round was spearheaded by YZi Labs (formerly Binance Labs), Republic Digital, and HyperChain Capital. Additionally, Breyer Capital, Big Brain Holdings, Crypto.com, DNA Fund, Selini Capital, Protein Capital, Quantstamp, and Web3.com, among others, also participated. The network aims to merge Bitcoin's security with Ethereum-style smart contracts in preparation for upcoming token generation events.According to the introduction, the core of the Hemi tech stack is the Hemi Virtual Machine (hVM), which is claimed to be a full Bitcoin node integrated within the Ethereum Virtual Machine. The team stated that the hVM incorporates a set of cross-chain "Tunnels" and a proof-of-proof consensus design proposed by co-founder Maxwell Sanchez. This architectural design enables applications to earn, borrow, and pool assets on B

item.title: Binance will list BAS/USDT Coin-Margined Perpetual Futures Contract with up to 50x leverage
item.description: August 26th. According to an official announcement, Binance has declared that it will list the BAS/USDT perpetual contract on August 26, 2025, at 21:30 (GMT+8). The maximum leverage that can be offered will be up to 50x.

item.title: SharpLink Allocates $252 Million to Increase Holding of 56,533 ETH
item.description: On August 26th, according to official information, SharpLink declared the acquisition of 56,533 Ethereum (ETH) with an average price of approximately $4,462 per coin.As of the present day, SharpLink possesses 797,704 ETH, and the total value amounts to approximately $3.7 billion.
